name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of May 17, in front of Taiwan’s Legislative Yuan, people and students protested against the legislative amendments to the powers of Congress, shouting “Support Taiwan, support democracy.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Lou Ye Interview

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: That night, legislators from the Democratic Progressive Party paid tribute to the people who gathered to protest outside the gate of the Legislative Yuan, emphasizing that everyone is an invisible seat for Taiwan's democracy, and hoped that everyone would accumulate energy and continue to protect Taiwan (Photo by Liu Yuqiu, CCTV)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Legislative Yuan will continue to review the congressional reform plan proposed by the opposition parties on the 21st Taiwan time

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we collaborate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humanitarian China @HChina89 to release a series of special photos on June 4th.
Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement Part 5 (May 17)
[Millions of People Parade] [Participation of the Central Youth League School of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 16, the Tuanjie Township government and police in Xishan District, Kunming suddenly demanded that more than 1,600 cats and dogs in five local stray animal rescue stations move out within three days, otherwise they would all be confiscated and transferred.
It is reported that these five rescue stations are all located at the foot of the mountain and have been sharing social responsibilities for the government for many years. They are currently completely unable to find a suitable place to relocate them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 18, the owners of Rongshengjiang Rongfu in Binjiang District, Hangzhou, worried that the houses could not be delivered on time and the quality could not be guaranteed, and there was a risk of unfinished projects, went to the Binjiang District Government to ask the Housing and Construction Bureau to coordinate with the company to deal with the problem. During the negotiation, some owners reported that they were followed by several men in black. There were a large number of special police and security guards in front of the gate of the district government. Among them, a man in a black T-shirt had a domineering attitude, which caused dissatisfaction. He pushed and pulled the owner representatives many times. Later, several owner representatives

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 17, Shanghai. A foreign singer was harassed by a man on stage while performing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 17, in Zhengzhou, Henan, security guards at the Bank of China poured water on the stone piers outside the gate to stop people from sitting on them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the Lianyungang seafood underweight incident fermented
Currently, Lianyungang official media has started a collective ban on comments, and has closed the comment area of their accounts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 17, Dongguan, Guangdong. The Nord Leather Factory closed down and the boss fled. Employees held banners outside the factory to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 17, in Leqing, Zhejiang, villagers in Hou'an Village posted a video saying that their food-producing land was forcibly sold by village cadres to build houses without any compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, netizens have begun to rename the Lianyungang Seafood Market on the map.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/48NaOlgkMB

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 17, in Nanning, Guangxi, Hu Jincheng and his wife were dragged away by police while they were protesting on the streets of Nanning. As of now, the Douyin topic #胡万权# has accumulated 120 million views on Douyin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/iAWHT9gm0X

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 12, in Dong'e County, Shandong Province, the local village committee illegally expropriated land without telling the villagers and defaulted on land compensation payments. The villagers raised their arms outside the village committee and shouted, "Black-hearted village committee, down with the village committee!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/76jHe21uGq

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 18, Peng Zugui, a psychiatrist at the West China Hospital of Sichuan University, said that among the 54 children in a class of a middle school in Chengdu, 18 of them were depressed, and 5 were severely depressed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, all Douban short comments and "Want to Watch" of "An Unfinished Movie" have been cleared
